name: jokebot
description: A github bot, on AWS Lambda, that sends you jokes on demand

scripts.start: source .env && claudia create --name jokebot --region eu-west-1 --handler main.handler
scripts.schedule: source .env && claudia add-scheduled-event --event ping.json --name jokebot --rate '1 minutes'

author: Tim Perry <pimterry@gmail.com>
